transcript:
Customer: Hello good evening sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir good evening sir.
Executive: Good evening.
Customer: Ah sir I am Krishna Prasad sir from IndiaMART how are you sir?
Executive: Okay okay okay how are you?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Nalla nalla nalla irukka nalla irukka soukyama irukka soukyama irukka.
Executive: Sorry sir please come again Tamil okay va?
Customer: All okay all okay soukyama irukka soukyama irukka. Nenga eppadi irukka soukyama?
Executive: Okay sir onne onnu thaan andha complaint onnu raise pannirunhingala adha kooda close pannikalaama appadi kooda pesalaamla.
Customer: Ah.
Executive: Okay thaan sir. I spoke to Gopalakrishnan I talked to Gopalakrishnan yesterday actually I was travelling I was not able to.
Executive: Actually he spoke with today yesterday he is in leave today actually he is my manager only okay okay the thing is two to three executives are leave today that's why I called you.
Customer: No I thought you are under hours yeah tell me sir.
Customer: Actually I was also travelling from yesterday I will be back to the office on office by Monday morning so I thought I can speak to Gopalakrishnan or you to you Monday because I am on travelling.
Executive: I think you are you can remember me I am Krishna Prasad I think you are remember me.
Customer: Of course of course I remember I remember I remember I know got it got it okay the one thing is I am just closing the concern is it okay for you?
Customer: No concern has to be closed let me let me speak and we have to close the concern we have to get the solution then we can close with the concern.
Executive: Yes sir that's what we are trying to reach almost about five to five six days actually we couldn't able to reach actually we couldn't able to do any correction sorry sir.
Customer: Yesterday yesterday I spoke to you or tomorrow I think Gopalakrishnan and one of your manager from WhatsApp itself.
Executive: Yeah that's right he only spoke he only spoke actually he only spoke actually but the thing is we are trying to reach from last four to five days actually yesterday only we had a chance to had a chance to discuss with you actually my thing is the things last time also you only did the payment from for me only at the time of TrustSeal service you don't remember those things actually I am here to give a support you only actually I think I think you can remember Krishna Prasad it's mine actually at the time of.
Customer: The concern I was raised not only yesterday day before yesterday or not only one week back the concern I raised long time back still the issue of issue was there.
Customer: So whatever the issue I raised you have to you people have to be solved it then it can it can eliminate it.
Customer: We spoke last week right but I spoke to your team by almost six six to seven months the concern is same what to do?
Executive: Sir the thing is the account manager changing is Kiran left the management Kiran is not working in IndiaMART that's why I am taking care of our company actually without executives actually.
Executive: That's the thing Muhammad Azar also left the job actually we can't this is this is what our main concern people is daily changing the job so what I will do our concern is same is not in but we we both know Srikant sir and Krishna Prasad are already in touch for last one year know that we can I know our our company's issue what we are facing throughout IndiaMART that's what I am saying it's already aware of myself actually employees will executives will get changed actually at the manager level you won't get changed know we are traveling almost we both are individually personally traveling for last one year actually I think you are aware of.
Customer: I understood I understood the people is changing that is one case whatever the concern is still there still the concern is there.
Executive: Yeah it will be to whom I can speak.
Customer: Why speaking why speaking to you or speaking to Gopalakrishnan the concern is not eliminated concern is still there.
Customer: I am traveling last two three days I don't have time to sit with the system to discuss in detail.
Executive: Sir it's just a five minutes sir to sort out your issue actually okay the thing is you do your business schedule we can't able to discuss with you that's a small thing actually my thing is.
Customer: The discussion with your people last one week is incorrect we are not getting proper time but before that Kiran was working a lot of things but there is no solution Azar was working lot of things but there is no solution but in between the time with last last week that is possible right what I will do while traveling how can I sit with the laptop?
Executive: Let's do I will continue I will continue after 8 o'clock is it possible?
Customer: Today 8 o'clock.
Executive: Taking the taking.
Customer: Even the hotel let me check then I will come because I am traveling I am not.
Executive: Today 8 o'clock right.
Customer: Let me check let me check because I am traveling let me check with the hotel I have some meeting then let me check with the hotel then I will call you this is your direct number right?
Executive: I am I am messaging I have texted you in WhatsApp that's my direct number actually you can call that number actually.
Customer: Just text me once again or WhatsApp me once again if I am available I will call you and we can sit this night itself otherwise we can sit Monday there is no other option I am calling by 8 pm after you are reaching your hotel okay I am just messaging you to your WhatsApp number okay.
Executive: Okay okay okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint not resolved, issue still persists.

- Frequent change of IndiaMART executives.

- Unable to sit with system due to travel.



Resolution:

- Executive informed he will text on WhatsApp.

- Customer will call back after 8 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, resolution, executives, follow up
